TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EncryptedXml extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示用于实现 XML 加密的进程模型。

span.span: Represents the process model for implementing XML encryption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是.NET Framework 中 XML 加密所用的主类。The class is the main class used for XML encryption in the .NET Framework. XML 加密是加密所有或部分 XML 文档或的任意数据的基于标准的、 可互操作方法。XML Encryption is a standards-based, interoperable way to encrypt all or part of an XML document or any arbitrary data. .NET Framework XML 加密类实现的 World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 规范，XML 加密位于http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。The .NET Framework XML encryption classes implement the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) specification for XML encryption located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/. 使用类需要一种标准方式中的共享应用程序或组织之间的加密的 XML 数据时。Use the class whenever you need to share encrypted XML data between applications or organizations in a standard way. 由 XML 加密的 W3C 规范的任何实现，可以解密使用此类加密的任何数据。Any data encrypted using this class can be decrypted by any implementation of the W3C specification for XML encryption. XML 加密将替换任何纯文本 XML 元素或文档``元素，它包含的加密 （或密码文本） 的纯文本 XML 表示形式或任意数据。XML encryption replaces any plain text XML element or document with the `` element, which contains an encrypted (or cipher text) representation of plain text XML or any arbitrary data. ``元素可以选择包含有关在何处可以找到将对密码文本进行解密的密钥信息和用哪种加密算法来加密纯文本。The `` element can optionally contain information about where to find a key that will decrypt the cipher text, and which cryptographic algorithm was used to encrypt the plain text. ``元素是类似于``元素在样式和使用情况，但还允许您将对值进行解密的密钥进行加密``元素。The `` element is similar to the `` element in style and usage, except that it allows you to encrypt a key that will decrypt the value of the `` element. 请注意，``元素和``元素将永远不会包含未加密的密钥。Note that the `` element and the `` element will never contain an unencrypted key. 使用以下方法之一来交换密钥信息：Use one of the following methods to exchange key information: - 不包括任何密钥信息。Do not include any key information. 如果选择此选项，这两个参与方必须达成的算法和密钥在交换加密的数据之前。If you choose this option, both parties must agree on an algorithm and key before they exchange encrypted data. - 包含密钥的位置的统一资源标识符 (URI) 属性中``元素。Include the location of the key in the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) attribute of the `` element. 这两个参与方必须同意提前在关键位置上，此位置必须保密的。Both parties must agree on the key location ahead of time and this location must be kept secret. - 包括映射到中的键的字符串名称``元素。Include a string name that maps to a key in the `` element. 这两个参与方必须达成一致的密钥名称映射之前在交换加密的数据和此映射必须保持机密。Both parties must agree on the key name mapping before they exchange encrypted data and this mapping must be kept secret. - 包括中的加密的密钥``元素。Include an encrypted key in the `` element. 这两个参与方必须达成之前在交换加密的数据解密的加密的密钥的密钥。Both parties must agree on the key that decrypts the encrypted key before they exchange encrypted data. 可以选择性地包含名称或将对中的密钥进行解密密钥的位置``元素。You can optionally include a name or location of the key that will decrypt the key in the `` element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建使用一个简单的实用程序类算法用于加密 XML 文档。The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple utility class that uses the algorithm to encrypt an XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何加密使用对称密钥的 XML 文档。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using a symmetric key. 此示例不包括加密的 XML 文档中的任何密钥信息。This example does not include any key information in the encrypted XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何加密使用对称密钥的 XML 文档。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using a symmetric key. 此示例将解密的方法将使用要查找适当的解密密钥的加密 XML 文档中嵌入到密钥名称。This example embeds a key name in the encrypted XML document that the decrypting method uses to find the appropriate decryption key. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKey/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何使用非对称密钥的 XML 文档进行加密。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using an asymmetric key. 此示例创建一个对称会话密钥进行加密文档，然后使用非对称密钥将嵌入到 XML 文档的会话密钥的加密的版本。This example creates a symmetric session key to encrypt the document and then uses the asymmetric key to embed an encrypted version of the session key into the XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何对使用 X.509 证书对 XML 文档进行加密。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using an X.509 certificate. 此示例创建一个对称会话密钥进行加密文档，然后使用 X.509 证书将嵌入到 XML 文档的会话密钥的加密的版本。This example creates a symmetric session key to encrypt the document and then uses the X.509 certificate to embed an encrypted version of the session key into the XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以解密元素使用的对称密钥。Use the method to decrypt an element using a symmetric key. 请注意，方法仅解密顶级 <`EncryptedData`> 标记。Note that the method only decrypts top-level <`EncryptedData`> tags. 在情况下，一个或多个 <`EncryptedData`> 标记已加密和更高级别中包含 <`EncryptedData`> 标记，可以调用单独为每个方法。In cases where one or more <`EncryptedData`> tags have been encrypted and are contained within higher level <`EncryptedData`> tags, you can call the method separately for each one. 请参阅有关代码示例的方法。See the method for a code example. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何加密使用对称密钥的 XML 文档。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using a symmetric key. 此示例不包括加密的 XML 文档中的任何密钥信息。This example does not include any key information in the encrypted XML document. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法来解密所有``在初始化期间加载 XML 文档的元素。The method decrypts all `` elements of the XML document loaded during initialization. 调用此方法之后, 所有``文档中的元素替换为纯文本版本。After you call this method, all `` elements in the document are replaced with plain text versions. 方法仅解密顶级``元素。The method decrypts only top-level `` elements. 如果你需要解密超级加密的文档 （不止一次加密的文档），则必须调用方法，直到所有重复``已解密的元素。If you need to decrypt a super-encrypted document (a document that is encrypted more than once), you must call the method repeatedly until all the `` elements have been decrypted. > [!NOTE] > 方法解密仅有效的 XML 数据。The method decrypts only valid XML data. 若要解密的任意数据，请使用方法。To decrypt arbitrary data, use the method. 若要使用 XML 加密的 X.509 证书，必须具有 Microsoft 增强加密提供程序安装和 X.509 证书必须使用增强的提供程序。To use XML Encryption with X.509 certificates, you must have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed and the X.509 certificate must use the Enhanced Provider. 如果你没有 Microsoft 增强加密提供程序安装或 X.509 证书不使用增强的提供程序， "未知错误"时，将引发解密 XML 文档。If you do not have the Microsoft Enhanced Cryptographic Provider installed or the X.509 certificate does not use the Enhanced Provider, a with an "Unknown Error" will be thrown when you decrypt an XML document. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用非对称密钥的 XML 文档进行加密。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using an asymmetric key. 此示例创建一个对称会话密钥进行加密文档，然后使用非对称密钥将嵌入到 XML 文档的会话密钥的加密的版本。This example creates a symmetric session key to encrypt the document and then uses the asymmetric key to embed an encrypted version of the session key into the XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncImbedKey/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何对使用 X.509 证书对 XML 文档进行加密。The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using an X.509 certificate. 此示例创建一个对称会话密钥进行加密文档，然后使用 X.509 证书将嵌入到 XML 文档的会话密钥的加密的版本。This example creates a symmetric session key to encrypt the document and then uses the X.509 certificate to embed an encrypted version of the session key into the XML document. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMapKeyX509/VB/sample.vb#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了如何解密高级别 <`EncryptedData`> 标记包含另一个加密 <`EncryptedData`> 标记。The following code example demonstrates how to decrypt a high level <`EncryptedData`> tag that contains another encrypted <`EncryptedData`> tag. [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.EncryptedDocument.DecryptDocument-SuperEncryption#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/Cryptography.XML.EncryptedDocument.DecryptDocument-SuperEncryption/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.EncryptedDocument.DecryptDocument-SuperEncryption#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/Cryptography.XML.EncryptedDocument.DecryptDocument-SuperEncryption/VB/sample.vb#1)]
